text: Osʹ Ibrahim skazav: «Hospody! Zroby tsey kray bezpechnym, i nadily plodamy tykh yoho zhyteliv, yaki uviruvaly v Allaha ta v Ostanniy Denʹ!» Skazav Allah: «A khto ne uviruye, tomu YA dozvolyu nasolodzhuvatysya zhyttyam lyshe nedovho. A potim YA vkynu yoho u vohnyanu karu — zhakhlyvym zhe ye tsey kinetsʹ!»
